Job Title: Sr. Software Engineer - Android Developer - Java/c++
Job Description: Job Description: - Mobile Engineer is an integral member of the engineering team responsible for developing innovative mobile solutions. - Responsible for the design and development of enterprise mobile applications for iPhone, Android OS, BlackBerry and others. - Work with internal business teams and product management to define requirements and develop technical specifications. Required Candidate profileCandidate Profile: - 4+ years professional programming in an object oriented language such as Java/C++. - 4+ years work experience in developing applications on a mobile platform. - B.Tech from Premier Institutes. (IIT- s, REC- s, BITS, etc preferred)  Skills Required: - Hands on experience in developing applications for iPhone, Blackberry, J2ME, or Android. - Strong technical and design skills and the ability to learn new technologies quickly. - Understanding of XML/JSON based RESTful API.
Doctorate: Doctorate Not Required, Any Doctorate in Any Specialization
